statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT timestamp, value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis GROUP BY DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM historical_data_for_trend_analysis WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, date FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_value < 50 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, date, forecast_value FROM forecasts WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100.0;
SELECT date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(value) > 50.0;
SELECT f.date, f.forecast_value, h.date, h.value FROM forecasts f JOIN historical_data h ON f.date = h.date WHERE f.forecast_value > h.value;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, event, value FROM historical_data WHERE event = 'Weather';
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM forecasting_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT date, forecast_value, confidence_level FROM forecasting_data ORDER BY forecast_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY event HAVING total_value > 500 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT trend_category, COUNT(trend_id) AS trend_count FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, date, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data WHERE confidence_level >= 0.95 ORDER BY date ASC, forecast_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hd.id, hd.date, hd.event, fa.date AS forecasted_date FROM historical_data hd LEFT JOIN forecasting_data fa ON hd.date = fa.date WHERE fa.date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date, value FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT result_id, result_description FROM analysis_results ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_id > 100 AND LENGTH(trend_name) < 20;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM historical_data;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, result_description FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, event_date, value FROM historical_data;
SELECT trend_description, trend_score FROM trend_analysis;
SELECT id, forecast_date, market_trend, forecast_value FROM forecasting_data;
SELECT stat_date, stat_type, stat_value FROM historical_statistics;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, event_date, event_description FROM historical_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT event_date, event_description, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM historical_data GROUP BY event_date, event_description;
SELECT t.id, t.trend_description, f.forecast_value FROM trend_analysis AS t JOIN forecasting_data AS f ON t.id = f.id WHERE t.trend_score > 0.8;
SELECT h.id, h.stat_date, h.stat_type, tf.market_trend FROM historical_statistics AS h JOIN trend_forecast AS tf ON h.id = tf.id WHERE h.stat_value < 50 ORDER BY h.stat_date ASC;
